jobsJson.descriptionPlain: A project analyst is a shared function who helps to drive projects from start to finish, including doing project prioritization and understanding existing market trends while also providing support to project managers through data analyses. A project analyst is also responsible for project documentation, monitoring, reports, and doing project iteration if needed. A project analyst is a shared function and will assist multiple project managers.
jobsJson.description: A project analyst is a shared function who helps to drive projects from start to finish, including doing project prioritization and understanding existing market trends while also providing support to project managers through data analyses. A project analyst is also responsible for project documentation, monitoring, reports, and doing project iteration if needed. A project analyst is a shared function and will assist multiple project managers.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Collect and analyze information on statistical data, market trend, customer feedback/issues, existing department metrics that are relevant to help in executing the projects well and/or to initiate and present new ideas for any new process improvement projects
  • Identify the goals and requirements for each project (Target cost, Target quality and Target Time)
  • Track, forecast, and report on project progress including metrics and challenges 
  • Create and manage documentation and reporting for each project
  • Verify data information and analyze the data to suit the direction of the projects

• Bachelor’s degree from top universities
  • 2 - 3 years of working experience, preferably in customer experience and operations in Tech Startup or experience working in a consulting firm
  • Experienced in leading a team
  • Agile, organized and has a huge sense of ownershipGreat stakeholder management and attention to details
  • Preferred Skills: Google Suite, Microsoft Excell: Advanced( e.g. VLOOKUP, INDEX+MATCH, SUMIFS. VBA/Macro is a plus)
